H0.text: Formula 1 driver Ayrton Senna died while leading the 1994 San Marino Grand Prix at which motor racing circuit. Monza

H1.text: Formula 1 driver Ayrton Senna died while leading the 1994 San Marino Grand Prix at which motor racing circuit. Silverstone

H2.text: Formula 1 driver Ayrton Senna died while leading the 1994 San Marino Grand Prix at which motor racing circuit. Spa-Francorchamps

H3.text: Formula 1 driver Ayrton Senna died while leading the 1994 San Marino Grand Prix at which motor racing circuit. ÃŒmola

A4.text: The 1994 San Marino Grand Prix was held at the Autodromo Enzo e Dino Ferrari, located in Imola, Italy.

A5.text: The 1994 Imola layout, which had been in place since 1981, was never again used for a Formula One race.
